name: Goodera
description: Goodera’s physical, hybrid and virtual volunteering activities benefit a global network of 50,000+ nonprofit partners across 50+ cause areas.We make volunteering frictionless, engaging, and impactful by leveraging our state-of-the-art technology.
Headline: Powering the World of Good
ShortDescription: Goodera helps companies enable their employees to volunteer with thousands of nonprofits in 100+ countries.
enhanced_description: Goodera provides a comprehensive platform for companies to facilitate employee volunteering initiatives. It supports various volunteering formats including physical, hybrid, and virtual activities. The platform connects employees with an extensive global network of over 50,000 nonprofit partners across more than 50 cause areas in over 100 countries, leveraging state-of-the-art technology to ensure volunteering experiences are frictionless, engaging, and impactful.
key_use_cases: Facilitating and managing global employee volunteering programs
Connecting employees with a diverse network of non-profit organizations
Enabling physical, hybrid, and virtual employee volunteering activities
Improving employee engagement and happiness through structured volunteering opportunities
Onboarding and training internal volunteering champions
competitive_advantages: Extensive global network of 50,000+ nonprofit partners across 50+ cause areas in 100+ countries
Support for multiple volunteering formats: physical, hybrid, and virtual
Leveraging state-of-the-art technology for frictionless, engaging, and impactful volunteering
Dedicated features for 'Champion onboarding & training' to scale volunteering programs
hr_functions_supported: Talent Management (specifically related to engagement and retention)
roi_benefits: Enhanced Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) impact and program effectiveness
